body.p:
The Management Team page can be used to define the site management team (users with the Owner, Admin, or Moderator role). To reach this page, click the Management Team link in the left menu bar in the interface for a particular site configuration (only users with an Owner or Admin role have access to this page). The current team is listed with their avatar, name, and email address. To the right of each team member, there is a drop-down menu where you can change their roles to one of the following:
Moderator - This type of user has rights to moderate comment posts (edit, approve, reject, or delete).
Admin - This type of user has rights to moderate comment posts and to configure site settings, versions, team members, and user roles. The site Owner also has all of these rights.The site Owner is automatically assigned when the site configuration is created. However, site ownership can be transferred from the General Settings page.
To remove a user, click the button to the right of the drop-down menu. When a user is removed from the management team, they are assigned a role of Member.

To add a new user, enter their email address in the Email field at the top of the page, assign a role with the drop-down menu, and click the Add button.The owner of the email address must be registered on the platform. If they have not already done so, they will need to sign up before you can add them.
